Memberships
Manatee Golfers Club Membership
The Membership For Everyone!
Experience exclusive perks and savings with a membership that grants you access to two fantastic golf courses: Manatee Golf Course & Buffalo Creek Golf Course. Whether you’re looking to play more golf, improve your skills, or enjoy discounts on merchandise and food, our membership has something for everyone!
Membership Options
Membership Plan
Price
Monthly
$59.95
3 Months
$149.95
6 Months
$269.95
12 Months
$499.95

Join the Manatee Golfers Club
Membership Benefits
Access to Two Courses
Play at both Manatee Golf Course & Buffalo Creek Golf Course
Exclusive Tee Times
Before 8 AM – 9 Hole Back Nine for $25.00
After 2 PM – Play as much as you can for $25.00
Merchandise Discount
20% off all pro shop merchandise
Food & Beverage Discount
20% off all items in the snack bar
Complimentary Clinics
Access to free golf clinics at both courses
Unlimited Range Balls
Practice without limits at our range
Golf Clinics
As a Manatee Golfers Club Member, you have access to both Free & Paid Golf Clinics. Members must sign up in the golf shop to participate.
Free Clinics:

Tuesdays at Manatee Golf Course
– 9:00 AM

Fridays at Buffalo Creek Golf Course
– 10:00 AM

Max Capacity:
12 players
Paid Clinics – $25 per session

Season Pass Options
Don’t want to commit? Check out our Season Pass Options
Enjoy unlimited golf at Buffalo Creek Golf Course and Manatee Golf Course with the 2024-2025 Season Pass. If you love to play frequently and want the flexibility of no restrictions, our Season Pass is the ultimate way to maximize your time on the course.

Explore Season Passes

Host an Event/Outing
Host Your Golf Outing at Buffalo Creek
Tournaments, Charity Events, Corporate Outings & More!
Buffalo Creek Golf Course offers a stunning layout and top-tier facilities, making it the perfect venue for league play, tournaments, charity events, and corporate outings. Whether you’re planning a competitive tournament or a relaxed day on the links with friends, our experienced hospitality team will handle the details—so you can focus on enjoying the game!
What’s Included in Your Golf Event Package?
Our event packages include everything you need to ensure a seamless and successful outing:
Hole-in-One & Par 3 Contests
Add excitement with special challenges
Format Selection
Scramble, Best Ball, Stroke Play, or customize your event
Entry Form Development
We’ll create and manage player sign-ups
Player Pairings & Hole Assignments
Organized and ready to go
Customized Cart Signs
Clearly labeled for an easy start
Simple Registration Process
Fast, easy check-in for all players
On-Course Contests
Longest Drive, Closest to the Pin, and more!
Customized Rules Sheets
Clear guidelines for a smooth event
Pre-Tournament Announcements
Welcome speech and instructions
Event Scoring
Professional and accurate results
Awards Presentation
Celebrate winners and wrap up in style
And Much More!
Fully customizable to meet your event’s needs
What You Can Expect

Championship Course Layout
A challenging yet enjoyable Ron Garl-designed course

Professional Event Coordination
Our team takes care of the details

Perfect for Any Group Size
From small leagues to large corporate outings

Clubhouse & Catering Options
Post-event dining and awards ceremonies available
No matter the size or purpose of your event, we’ll help you plan, organize, and execute a fantastic day of golf.
